text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock Disappointed in you Andrew Gov bashing along with piers & big mouth sidekick. It’s not political for me TBH I think they couldn’t do much more than have. like us ALL were in uncharted waters errors will be made hindsight’s a great thing they’re all look tired and doing best can
